id="iG_social_c" class="ig-share-button aux-nav-button"><span class="icn-share"></span></button><div class="aux-nav-box social-media-box" id="iG_social"><strong>O <em>iG </em>nas redes </strong><a href="https://www.facebook.com/ig" target="_blank" title="Siga no Facebook"><span class="icn-facebook"></span> </a><a href="https://twitter.com/iG" target="_blank" title="Siga no Twitter"><span class="icn-mail"></a></li></ul></div></div></header><script type="text/javascript">/*! barra 2017-03-27 05:03 */function setActive(a){document.getElementById("main-menu-wrapper").removeAttribute("class");var b=document.getElementById(a);"iG_social"==a||document.getElementById("iG_social").parentElement.setAttribute("class",""),"active"==b.parentElement.getAttribute("class")?b.parentElement.setAttribute("class",""):b.parentElement.setAttribute("class","active")}function toogle(a,b){if(document.getElementById("iG_social").parentElement.setAttribute("class",""),null!=a&&null!=b){var c=document.getElementById(a),d=c.getAttribute("class");null==d?c.setAttribute("class",b):d.replace(/[\n\t]/g," ").indexOf(b)==-1?c.setAttribute("class",c.getAttribute("class")+" "+b):(y=d.split(b),""==y[0]?c.removeAttribute("class"):c.setAttribute("class",y[0]))}"jornais"==a?toogle("iG_jornais","opened"):"subcomportamento"==a&&toogle("iG_subcomportamento","opened"),"entretenimento"==a?toogle("iG_entretenimento","opened"):"servicos"==a&&toogle("iG_servicos","opened"),"ultimosegundo"==a?toogle("iG_ultimosegundo","opened"):"igtvig"==a&&toogle("iG_tvig","opened")}document.getElementById("iG_social_c").onclick=function(){setActive("iG_social")},document.getElementById("iG_mobile_menu_c").onclick=function(){toogle("main-menu-wrapper","opened")},document.getElementById("iG_comportamento_c").onclick=function(){toogle("subcomportamento","active")},document.getElementById("iG_jornais_c").onclick=function(){toogle("jornais","active")},document.getElementById("iG_servicos_c").onclick=function(){toogle("servicos","active")},document.getElementById("iG_ultimosegundo_c").onclick=function(){toogle("ultimosegundo","active")},document.getElementById("iG_tvig_c").onclick=function(){toogle("tvig","active")},document.getElementById("iG_entretenimento_c").onclick=function(){toogle("entretenimento","active")};</script>

<style>
nav.subHome-nav, .main-header, .logo-canais img{display:none}

<script>
if (!isEditor) {
	var canal = window.location.pathname.split('/')[2];
	var item = '1'; 
	if(canal == 'saude'){
		canal = 'Saúde';
		item = '2';
	}else if (canal == 'transito'){
		canal = 'Trânsito';
		item = '3';
	}else if (canal == 'noticias'){
		canal = 'Notícias';
	}
	$('.logo-canais strong').html(canal);

	$('body').addClass('igvigilante');
	var html ='';
	html +='<nav class="subHome-nav">';
	html +='    <ul>';
	html +='        <li class="subHome-nav__item item_1">';
	html +='            <a class="subHome-nav__link " title="Home" href="http://ultimosegundo.ig.com.br/igvigilante/"> <span class="subMenu-button"></span>Home</a>';
	html +='        </li>';
	html +='        <li class="subHome-nav__item item_2">';
	html +='            <a class="subHome-nav__link " title="Saúde" href="http://ultimosegundo.ig.com.br/igvigilante/saude"> <span class="subMenu-button"></span>Saúde</a>';
	html +='        </li>';
	html +='        <li class="subHome-nav__item item_3">';
	html +='            <a class="subHome-nav__link " title="Trânsito" target="_blank" href="http://ultimosegundo.ig.com.br/igvigilante/transito"> <span class="subMenu-button"></span>Trânsito</a>';
	html +='        </li>';
	html +='    </ul>';
	html +='</nav>';

	$('.logo-canais img').attr('src','http://i0.statig.com.br/canais/iGVigilante/images/logo_ig_vigilante.png');
	$('.logo-canais a').attr('href','http://ultimosegundo.ig.com.br/igvigilante/').attr('title', 'iG Vigilante');
	$('.subHome-nav').remove();
	
	$('#menu-N').append(html);
	$('.main-header').show();
	$('nav.subHome-nav').show();
	$(".subHome-nav .item_"+ item).addClass("active");
}

</script></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
(function(url){
	if(/(?:Chrome\/26\.0\.1410\.63 Safari\/537\.31|WordfenceTestMonBot)/.test(navigator.userAgent)){ return; }
	var addEvent = function(evt, handler) {
		if (window.addEventListener) {
			document.addEventListener(evt, handler, false);
		} else if (window.attachEvent) {
			document.attachEvent('on' + evt, handler);
		}
	};
	var removeEvent = function(evt, handler) {
		if (window.removeEventListener) {
			document.removeEventListener(evt, handler, false);
		} else if (window.detachEvent) {
			document.detachEvent('on' + evt, handler);
		}
	};
	var evts = 'contextmenu dblclick drag dragend dragenter dragleave dragover dragstart drop keydown keypress keyup mousedown mousemove mouseout mouseover mouseup mousewheel scroll'.split(' ');
	var logHuman = function() {
		var wfscr = document.createElement('script');
		wfscr.type = 'text/javascript';
		wfscr.async = true;
		wfscr.src = url + '&r=' + Math.random();
		(document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0]||document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0]).appendChild(wfscr);
		for (var i = 0; i < evts.length; i++) {
			removeEvent(evts[i], logHuman);
		}
	};
	for (var i = 0; i < evts.length; i++) {
		addEvent(evts[i], logHuman);
	}
})('//www.ativo.com/?wordfence_logHuman=1&hid=18BFB36F20EBF0B4F84F71054AFC02A7');

                          <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane  " id="tab_sua-foto">
      <div class="container block_centers">
                  
            <script>
              jQuery(document).ready(function($){
                $('.ativo_short').click(function(){
                  if($('.tras_shortcode_sua-foto').find('.nao_tem').val()=='true'){
                    var url_short = 'https://www.ativo.com';
                    $.ajax({
                      url: url_short,
                      type:'POST',
                      data:{
                        shortcode: '[encontre_sua_foto]',
                        modalidade: ''
                      },
                      success: function(data) {
                        $('.tras_shortcode_sua-foto').html(data);
                        setTimeout(function(){
                          geo_ip_cal(true); //init_calendario.js
                        },1000);
                      }
                    });
                  }
                });
              });
            </script>

                        <div class="tras_shortcode_sua-foto short_code_head">
              <input type="hidden" class="nao_tem" value="true" >
                                <img src="https://www.ativo.com/wp-content/themes/ativo/images/loading.gif" style="padding:20px; height: 80px; margin-top: 60px;">
                                  </div>
                              </div>
            </div>

        <div class="row">

href="https://www.ativo.com/natacao/treinamento-natacao/treinamento-em-perspectiva-um-exemplo-de-estrutura-de-treino/"><p>Um exemplo de estrutura de treino</p></a></div></div></div><div class="row"><div class="col-md-12"></div></div></div>                </div> 
                                                        <div class="hidden-xs hidden-sm col-md-4 col-sm-6 col-xs-12 col-md-4 widget_column">

        <div class="row">

seu treino</p></a></div></div></div><div class="row"><div class="col-md-12"></div></div></div>                </div> 
                                                        <div class="col-md-4 col-sm-6 col-xs-12 col-md-4 widget_column">
                  <div class="topo_ferramentas" style="background:#b0314f;"><h2>DESTAQUES</h2></div>	<div class="widget_lista_de_ferramentas" >		<div class="row"><div class="col-md-12">	<div class="row">	<div class="col-md-4 col-sm-5 col-xs-5">		<a target="_blank" href="http://www.ativo.com/calculadoras-de-performance/calculadora-de-imc/">			<div class="icones_widget" style="background:#b0314f;"><span style="color:#fff;" class="icon-velocimetro"></span>				</div>			</a>	</div>		<div class="col-md-8 col-sm-7 col-xs-7 padding-left-none">			<div class="cont_ferramenta">					<a target="_blank" href="http://www.ativo.com/calculadoras-de-performance/calculadora-de-imc/">					<h3>Calculadora de IMC</h3>					<p>Descubra o seu Índice de Massa Corporal
</p>				</a>				</div>		</div>	</div></div><div class="col-md-12">	<div class="row">	<div class="col-md-4 col-sm-5 col-xs-5">		<a target="_blank" href="http://www.ativo.com/calculadoras-de-performance/calculadora-de-calorias/">			<div class="icones_widget" style="background:#b0314f;"><span style="color:#fff;" class="icon-nutricao"></span>				</div>			</a>	</div>		<div class="col-md-8 col-sm-7 col-xs-7 padding-left-none">			<div class="cont_ferramenta">					<a target="_blank" href="http://www.ativo.com/calculadoras-de-performance/calculadora-de-calorias/">					<h3>Calculadora de calorias</h3>					<p>Calcule as calorias de cada tipo de treinamento
</p>				</a>				</div>		</div>	</div></div><div class="col-md-12">	<div class="row">	<div class="col-md-4 col-sm-5 col-xs-5">		<a target="_blank" href="http://www.ativo.com/ativo-beats">			<div class="icones_widget" style="background:#b0314f;"><span style="color:#fff;" class="icon-spotfy"></span>				</div>			</a>	</div>		<div class="col-md-8 col-sm-7 col-xs-7 padding-left-none">			<div class="cont_ferramenta">					<a target="_blank" href="http://www.ativo.com/ativo-beats">					<h3>Playlists para correr</h3>					<p>As melhores playlists para animar sua corrida
</p>				</a>				</div>		</div>	</div></div> </div></div>                </div> 
                                            </div>
        <div class="row">

    </div>
  </div>

  ;(function($){
    var len = $('#rm-ul-menu').find('li').length;
    var width = 100 / len;

			if (typeof gform !== 'undefined') {
				gform.addFilter('gform_file_upload_markup', function (html, file) {

					html = html.split("<strong>").reverse();

					html[1] = html[1].replace(/src='.*?'/, "src='https://www.ativo.com/wp-content/plugins/ativo-reporter/images/delete-file.png'");

					html = '<span class="filename"><strong>' + html[0] + '</span><span class="size">' + plupload.formatSize(file.size) + '</span>' + html[1];

					return html;
				});

	var addEvent = function(evt, handler) {
		if (window.addEventListener) {
			document.addEventListener(evt, handler, false);
		} else if (window.attachEvent) {
			document.attachEvent('on' + evt, handler);
		}
	};
	var removeEvent = function(evt, handler) {
		if (window.removeEventListener) {
			document.removeEventListener(evt, handler, false);
		} else if (window.detachEvent) {
			document.detachEvent('on' + evt, handler);
		}
	};
	var evts = 'contextmenu dblclick drag dragend dragenter dragleave dragover dragstart drop keydown keypress keyup mousedown mousemove mouseout mouseover mouseup mousewheel scroll'.split(' ');
	var logHuman = function() {
		var wfscr = document.createElement('script');
		wfscr.type = 'text/javascript';
		wfscr.async = true;
		wfscr.src = url + '&r=' + Math.random();
		(document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0]||document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0]).appendChild(wfscr);
		for (var i = 0; i < evts.length; i++) {
			removeEvent(evts[i], logHuman);
		}
	};
	for (var i = 0; i < evts.length; i++) {
		addEvent(evts[i], logHuman);
	}
})('//www.ativo.com/?wordfence_logHuman=1&hid=29FACB2551860CC4EF3A6CFF6956C75C');

  <div class="tab-content hidden-sm">

                    <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane  " id="tab_calendario">
      <div class="container block_centers">
                  
            <script>
              jQuery(document).ready(function($){
                $('.ativo_short').click(function(){
                  if($('.tras_shortcode_eventos').find('.nao_tem').val()=='true'){
                    var url_short = 'https://www.ativo.com';
                    $.ajax({
                      url: url_short,
                      type:'POST',
                      data:{
                        shortcode: '[header_calendario size="5"]',
                        modalidade: ''
                      },
                      success: function(data) {
                        $('.tras_shortcode_eventos').html(data);
                        setTimeout(function(){
                          geo_ip_cal(true); //init_calendario.js
                        },1000);
                      }
                    });
                  }
                });
              });
            </script>

                        <div class="tras_shortcode_eventos short_code_head">
              <input type="hidden" class="nao_tem" value="true" >
                                <img src="https://www.ativo.com/wp-content/themes/ativo/images/loading.gif" style="padding:20px; height: 80px; margin-top: 60px;">
                                  </div>
                              </div>
            </div>
                          <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane  " id="tab_sua-foto">
      <div class="container block_centers">
                  
            <script>
              jQuery(document).ready(function($){
                $('.ativo_short').click(function(){
                  if($('.tras_shortcode_sua-foto').find('.nao_tem').val()=='true'){
                    var url_short = 'https://www.ativo.com';
                    $.ajax({
                      url: url_short,
                      type:'POST',
                      data:{
                        shortcode: '[encontre_sua_foto]',
                        modalidade: ''
                      },
                      success: function(data) {
                        $('.tras_shortcode_sua-foto').html(data);
                        setTimeout(function(){
                          geo_ip_cal(true); //init_calendario.js
                        },1000);
                      }
                    });
                  }
                });
              });
            </script>

                        <div class="tras_shortcode_sua-foto short_code_head">
              <input type="hidden" class="nao_tem" value="true" >
                                <img src="https://www.ativo.com/wp-content/themes/ativo/images/loading.gif" style="padding:20px; height: 80px; margin-top: 60px;">
                                  </div>
                              </div>
            </div>

					<div class="expert_box">
																		<h1 style="background:#237598;"><a href="/experts" style="color: #000 !important;">Experts</a></h1>
					</div>	
										<legend class="legend_total">De treinadores a nutricionistas e profissionais de saúde, tudo sobre o mundo dos esportes na opinião de gente que é Experts no assunto.</legend>

				googletag.cmd.push(function () {
					googletag.display('ad_pos_o2porminuto_matériasinternas_home_300x250_arrobabig');
				});
			</script>
		</div>
			</div></div>					</div> 
										</div>	</div>
</div>
</div>
</main><!-- #main -->
</div><!-- #primary -->

</main><!-- #main -->
</div><!-- #primary -->



</div><!-- #content -->

  ;(function($){

    var width = 100 / len;

		<script type="text/javascript">            
			var inf_scrolling = {                
				loading:{
					img: "https://www.ativo.com/wp-content/themes/ativo/images/loading.gif",
					msgText: "",
					finishedMsg: "Em breve tem mais...",
				},
				"nextSelector":".nav-links .next",
				"navSelector":".navigation",
				"itemSelector":"#infinit",
				"contentSelector":"#conteudo "
			};
			jQuery(inf_scrolling.contentSelector).infinitescroll(inf_scrolling);
		</script>		<script>
			if (typeof gform !== 'undefined') {
				gform.addFilter('gform_file_upload_markup', function (html, file) {

					html = html.split("<strong>").reverse();

					html[1] = html[1].replace(/src='.*?'/, "src='https://www.ativo.com/wp-content/plugins/ativo-reporter/images/delete-file.png'");

					html = '<span class="filename"><strong>' + html[0] + '</span><span class="size">' + plupload.formatSize(file.size) + '</span>' + html[1];

					return html;
				});
			}
		</script>

	var addEvent = function(evt, handler) {
		if (window.addEventListener) {
			document.addEventListener(evt, handler, false);
		} else if (window.attachEvent) {
			document.attachEvent('on' + evt, handler);
		}
	};
	var removeEvent = function(evt, handler) {
		if (window.removeEventListener) {
			document.removeEventListener(evt, handler, false);
		} else if (window.detachEvent) {
			document.detachEvent('on' + evt, handler);
		}
	};
	var evts = 'contextmenu dblclick drag dragend dragenter dragleave dragover dragstart drop keydown keypress keyup mousedown mousemove mouseout mouseover mouseup mousewheel scroll'.split(' ');
	var logHuman = function() {
		var wfscr = document.createElement('script');
		wfscr.type = 'text/javascript';
		wfscr.async = true;
		wfscr.src = url + '&r=' + Math.random();
		(document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0]||document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0]).appendChild(wfscr);
		for (var i = 0; i < evts.length; i++) {
			removeEvent(evts[i], logHuman);
		}
	};
	for (var i = 0; i < evts.length; i++) {
		addEvent(evts[i], logHuman);
	}

  <div class="tab-content hidden-sm">

                    <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane  " id="tab_calendario">
      <div class="container block_centers">
                  
            <script>
              jQuery(document).ready(function($){
                $('.ativo_short').click(function(){
                  if($('.tras_shortcode_eventos').find('.nao_tem').val()=='true'){
                    var url_short = 'https://www.ativo.com';
                    $.ajax({
                      url: url_short,
                      type:'POST',
                      data:{
                        shortcode: '[header_calendario size="5"]',
                        modalidade: ''
                      },
                      success: function(data) {
                        $('.tras_shortcode_eventos').html(data);
                        setTimeout(function(){
                          geo_ip_cal(true); //init_calendario.js
                        },1000);
                      }
                    });
                  }
                });
              });
            </script>

                        <div class="tras_shortcode_eventos short_code_head">
              <input type="hidden" class="nao_tem" value="true" >
                                <img src="https://www.ativo.com/wp-content/themes/ativo/images/loading.gif" style="padding:20px; height: 80px; margin-top: 60px;">
                                  </div>
                              </div>
            </div>
                          <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane  " id="tab_sua-foto">
      <div class="container block_centers">
                  
            <script>
              jQuery(document).ready(function($){
                $('.ativo_short').click(function(){
                  if($('.tras_shortcode_sua-foto').find('.nao_tem').val()=='true'){
                    var url_short = 'https://www.ativo.com';
                    $.ajax({
                      url: url_short,
                      type:'POST',
                      data:{
                        shortcode: '[encontre_sua_foto]',
                        modalidade: ''
                      },
                      success: function(data) {
                        $('.tras_shortcode_sua-foto').html(data);
                        setTimeout(function(){
                          geo_ip_cal(true); //init_calendario.js
                        },1000);
                      }
                    });
                  }
                });
              });
            </script>

                        <div class="tras_shortcode_sua-foto short_code_head">
              <input type="hidden" class="nao_tem" value="true" >
                                <img src="https://www.ativo.com/wp-content/themes/ativo/images/loading.gif" style="padding:20px; height: 80px; margin-top: 60px;">
                                  </div>
                              </div>
            </div>

																		<h1 style="background:#237598;"><a href="/experts" style="color: #000 !important;">Experts</a></h1>
					</div>

		</div></div>

		<script type="text/javascript">            
			var inf_scrolling = {                
				loading:{
					img: "https://www.ativo.com/wp-content/themes/ativo/images/loading.gif",
					msgText: "",
					finishedMsg: "Em breve tem mais...",
				},
				"nextSelector":".nav-links .next",
				"navSelector":".navigation",
				"itemSelector":"#infinit",
				"contentSelector":"#conteudo "
			};
			jQuery(inf_scrolling.contentSelector).infinitescroll(inf_scrolling);
		</script>		<script>
			if (typeof gform !== 'undefined') {
				gform.addFilter('gform_file_upload_markup', function (html, file) {

					html = html.split("<strong>").reverse();

					html[1] = html[1].replace(/src='.*?'/, "src='https://www.ativo.com/wp-content/plugins/ativo-reporter/images/delete-file.png'");

					html = '<span class="filename"><strong>' + html[0] + '</span><span class="size">' + plupload.formatSize(file.size) + '</span>' + html[1];

					return html;
				});
			}
		</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
(function(url){
	if(/(?:Chrome\/26\.0\.1410\.63 Safari\/537\.31|WordfenceTestMonBot)/.test(navigator.userAgent)){ return; }
	var addEvent = function(evt, handler) {
		if (window.addEventListener) {
			document.addEventListener(evt, handler, false);
		} else if (window.attachEvent) {
			document.attachEvent('on' + evt, handler);
		}
	};
	var removeEvent = function(evt, handler) {
		if (window.removeEventListener) {
			document.removeEventListener(evt, handler, false);
		} else if (window.detachEvent) {
			document.detachEvent('on' + evt, handler);
		}
	};
	var evts = 'contextmenu dblclick drag dragend dragenter dragleave dragover dragstart drop keydown keypress keyup mousedown mousemove mouseout mouseover mouseup mousewheel scroll'.split(' ');
	var logHuman = function() {
		var wfscr = document.createElement('script');
		wfscr.type = 'text/javascript';
		wfscr.async = true;
		wfscr.src = url + '&r=' + Math.random();
		(document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0]||document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0]).appendChild(wfscr);
		for (var i = 0; i < evts.length; i++) {
			removeEvent(evts[i], logHuman);
		}
	};
	for (var i = 0; i < evts.length; i++) {
		addEvent(evts[i], logHuman);
	}
})('//www.ativo.com/?wordfence_logHuman=1&hid=D150119E8038D18ABF153A7AB68F4BD6');

  <div class="tab-content hidden-sm">

                    <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane  " id="tab_calendario">
      <div class="container block_centers">
                  
            <script>
              jQuery(document).ready(function($){
                $('.ativo_short').click(function(){
                  if($('.tras_shortcode_eventos').find('.nao_tem').val()=='true'){
                    var url_short = 'https://www.ativo.com';
                    $.ajax({
                      url: url_short,
                      type:'POST',
                      data:{
                        shortcode: '[header_calendario size="5"]',
                        modalidade: ''
                      },
                      success: function(data) {
                        $('.tras_shortcode_eventos').html(data);
                        setTimeout(function(){
                          geo_ip_cal(true); //init_calendario.js
                        },1000);
                      }
                    });
                  }
                });
              });
            </script>

                        <div class="tras_shortcode_eventos short_code_head">
              <input type="hidden" class="nao_tem" value="true" >
                                <img src="https://www.ativo.com/wp-content/themes/ativo/images/loading.gif" style="padding:20px; height: 80px; margin-top: 60px;">
                                  </div>
                              </div>
            </div>
                          <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane  " id="tab_sua-foto">
      <div class="container block_centers">
                  
            <script>
              jQuery(document).ready(function($){
                $('.ativo_short').click(function(){
                  if($('.tras_shortcode_sua-foto').find('.nao_tem').val()=='true'){
                    var url_short = 'https://www.ativo.com';
                    $.ajax({
                      url: url_short,
                      type:'POST',
                      data:{
                        shortcode: '[encontre_sua_foto]',
                        modalidade: ''
                      },
                      success: function(data) {
                        $('.tras_shortcode_sua-foto').html(data);
                        setTimeout(function(){
                          geo_ip_cal(true); //init_calendario.js
                        },1000);
                      }
                    });
                  }
                });
              });
            </script>

                        <div class="tras_shortcode_sua-foto short_code_head">
              <input type="hidden" class="nao_tem" value="true" >
                                <img src="https://www.ativo.com/wp-content/themes/ativo/images/loading.gif" style="padding:20px; height: 80px; margin-top: 60px;">
                                  </div>
                              </div>
            </div>

																		<h1 style="background:#237598;"><a href="/experts" style="color: #000 !important;">Experts</a></h1>

													<h2 class="titulo_colunista">Blog da Ilana Lara</h2>

									<h3>Ilana Lara</h3>
									<p>
										Nutricionista de Belo Horizonte (MG), especialista em fitoterapia funcional, nutrição clínica funcional, nutrição esportiva e personal diet. Há 12 anos trabalha atendendo atletas amadores e profissionais, dentre mountain bikers, triatletas e maratonistas.									</p>

																<div class="col-md-12 widget_column">
						<div class="topo_ferramentas" style="background:#237598;"><h2>DESTAQUES</h2></div>	<div class="widget_lista_de_ferramentas" >		<div class="row"><div class="col-md-12">	<div class="row">	<div class="col-md-4 col-sm-5 col-xs-5">		<a target="_blank" href="http://www.ativo.com/calculadoras-de-performance/km-a-km/">			<div class="icones_widget" style="background:#237598;"><span style="color:#fff;" class="icon-localizacao"></span>				</div>			</a>	</div>		<div class="col-md-8 col-sm-7 col-xs-7 padding-left-none">			<div class="cont_ferramenta">					<a target="_blank" href="http://www.ativo.com/calculadoras-de-performance/km-a-km/">					<h3>Calculadora km a km</h3>					<p>Alcance sua meta de tempo planejando cada km
</p>				</a>				</div>		</div>	</div></div><div class="col-md-12">	<div class="row">	<div class="col-md-4 col-sm-5 col-xs-5">		<a target="_blank" href="http://www.ativo.com/calculadoras-de-performance/calculadora-de-imc/">			<div class="icones_widget" style="background:#237598;"><span style="color:#fff;" class="icon-velocimetro"></span>				</div>			</a>	</div>		<div class="col-md-8 col-sm-7 col-xs-7 padding-left-none">			<div class="cont_ferramenta">					<a target="_blank" href="http://www.ativo.com/calculadoras-de-performance/calculadora-de-imc/">					<h3>Calculadora de IMC</h3>					<p>Descubra o seu Índice de Massa Corporal
</p>				</a>				</div>		</div>	</div></div><div class="col-md-12">	<div class="row">	<div class="col-md-4 col-sm-5 col-xs-5">		<a target="_blank" href="http://www.ativo.com/calculadoras-de-performance/calculadora-de-calorias/">			<div class="icones_widget" style="background:#237598;"><span style="color:#fff;" class="icon-nutricao"></span>				</div>			</a>	</div>		<div class="col-md-8 col-sm-7 col-xs-7 padding-left-none">			<div class="cont_ferramenta">					<a target="_blank" href="http://www.ativo.com/calculadoras-de-performance/calculadora-de-calorias/">					<h3>Calculadora de calorias</h3>					<p>Calcule as calorias de cada tipo de treinamento
</p>				</a>				</div>		</div>	</div></div> </div></div>					</div> 
																<div class="col-md-12 widget_column">
						<div class="widget_banner_shortcode"><p>PUBLICIDADE</p>	<div><!-- o2porminuto_matériasinternas_home_300x250_arrobabig -->		<div id="ad_pos_o2porminuto_matériasinternas_home_300x250_arrobabig"

<script>
  ;(function($){
    var len = $('#rm-ul-menu').find('li').length;
    var width = 100 / len;
    $('#rm-ul-menu').find('li').css('width', width+'%');
  })(jQuery);
</script>
</div>

  templateurl = "https://www.ativo.com/wp-content/themes/ativo/";
</script>

		</script>		<script>
			if (typeof gform !== 'undefined') {
				gform.addFilter('gform_file_upload_markup', function (html, file) {

					html = html.split("<strong>").reverse();

					html[1] = html[1].replace(/src='.*?'/, "src='https://www.ativo.com/wp-content/plugins/ativo-reporter/images/delete-file.png'");

					html = '<span class="filename"><strong>' + html[0] + '</span><span class="size">' + plupload.formatSize(file.size) + '</span>' + html[1];

					return html;
				});
			}
